item.title: Breaking PDO: When Prepared Statements Aren't Enough
item.description: A novel SQL injection technique that bypasses PDO prepared statements using null byte parser exploitation

item.title: Who Am I?
item.description:
I’m net0, a cybersecurity enthusiast and IT support specialist. I’m passionate about penetration testing, Active Directory security, and solving complex CTF challenges.

What I Do

  • Currently working through HackTheBox CPTS certification
  • CTF Player: Focusing on AD exploitation, privilege escalation, and web security
  • Documenting my learning journey through writeups

Skills & Tools

Offensive Security:

  • Active Directory attacks (ADCS, Kerberos delegation, ESC3/ESC8/ESC15/ESC16)
  • Network Recon
  • Linux & Windows privilege escalation
  • Web application pentesting

IT & Automation:
